isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLES: SPICER J400-S, W460-S - SERVICE PROCEDURES - END YOKES AND FLANGES

caution.para: Hammering on end yokes or flanges to remove or install them is not only destructive to the yoke or flange itself, but can also cause serious internal damage. Hammering on end yokes can close in the bearing bores or misalign yoke lugs and result in early failures of journal needle bearings or other driveline components. Serious damage can also be done internally to the ring and pinion set or pinion bearings by hammering on external parts. End yokes or flanges should be removed or installed using a recommended method such as that described herein.
